# Medication dosage

[:material-play-circle: Run this example](https://numbat.dev/?q=%23+This+script+calculates+the+total+daily+dose+and+per+intake%0A%23+dose+of+a+medication+based+on+a+person%27s+body+weight.%0A%0A%40aliases%28takings%29%0Aunit+taking%0A%0Alet+body_weight+%3D+75+kg%0Alet+dosage+%3D+%2860+mg+%2F+kg%29+%2F+day%0Alet+frequency+%3D+3+takings+%2F+day%0A%0Alet+total_daily_dose+%3D+dosage+%2A+body_weight+-%3E+mg+%2F+day%0Aprint%28%22Total+daily+dose%3A+%7Btotal_daily_dose%7D%22%29%0A%0Alet+single_dose+%3D+total_daily_dose+%2F+frequency%0Aprint%28%22Single+dose%3A++++++%7Bsingle_dose%7D%22%29%0A){ .md-button .md-button--primary }

```numbat
# This script calculates the total daily dose and per intake
# dose of a medication based on a person's body weight.

@aliases(takings)
unit taking

let body_weight = 75 kg
let dosage = (60 mg / kg) / day
let frequency = 3 takings / day

let total_daily_dose = dosage * body_weight -> mg / day
print("Total daily dose: {total_daily_dose}")

let single_dose = total_daily_dose / frequency
print("Single dose:      {single_dose}")
```
